title: The Gary Null Show
content:
Dealing with Anxiety in our Anxious Age Dr. <!--more--> Marcey Shapiro is a board certified family physician specializing in integrative medicine.
In addition to her conventional medical education, she is also trained in mind-body techniques, Western and Chinese herbal medicine, acupuncture, nutritional therapies and a variety of hands-on modalities.
She has been in an instructor in herbal and natural health for over 25 years and practices individualized medicine that balances the physical, psychological and spiritual dimensions of the patient.
Dr Shapiro is the author of “Freedom from Anxiety: A Holistic Approach to Emotional Well Being”   Her website is MarceyShapiroMD.com
